title: Can you play background music on Zoom? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can hear background music if you have an earphone attached and you change the speaker of the zoom call to your laptop speaker. So, you can hear the background music in your earphone and the audio of the zoom call will be heard through the device’s speaker. But if you want others to hear the background music, there is no option as such.

Hey bro, Yes you can play background music on zoom… By doing this.. With your Zoom settings adjusted all you need to do is start playing the music you wish to include in your class. This could be via a streaming service (Spotify, Apple music etc.) or directly from a CD or file but it must be played via the device you are using for your Zoom call. HOPE it helps 😁😁
